group.label: Frontend Events
group.comment: Enable this setting to receive frontend events from your Magento store in Squeezely.

field.label: Enabled
field.comment: This setting determines if Squeezely should fetch events from your visitors in your website frontend. This covers the following events: Session-start, Pageview, ViewContent, Addtocart & Purchase. Disable this setting if you want to implement events separately.
